name: Zombie Facility: The 51st Test
description:
Test Initiated. Objective: See how long subject survives. Starting in 3..2..1

You are a man, but to them you are just another subject. Well, no point in not doing as they say. See how long you can survive in this horde surival twin-stick shooter game.

Controller is heavily recommended, altough it is playable with keyboard (but for the love of everything undead, for your own sake use a controller). 

There is also a bug on the main screen. If you press with a mouse, all menu buttons become unpressable... so you know... don't do that. 

Available for Windows only!
